page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content:
LITTER Litter is quite a big problem around some areas.Hawthorn Road area is full of litter because of the shops like take aways,sweet shops,toy shops and department stores. I think teenagers and kids make the mess mainly because of the sweets,crisps,ice lollies and fish and chip wrappers.
VANDALISM Vandalism is quite a big problem in Birmingham.We have had a lot of vandalism done to our school.Vandalism has been done to telephone boxes,houses and shops.Some new trees were planted at the sides of the roads,but lots of them have been broken off.
